attributes.action: stop social services from taking new born babies from mums and making partners choose between their kid and partner
attributes.additional_details: Time to stop social services its time they stop taking newborn babies from mothers in hospital with a bad past or past adopted kids everyone deserves another chance and an assessment weather theve had ten already or not people change they deserve a chance. And one parent should not be told to choose between their partner and their baby its wrong and its blackmail between the person they love and want to be with and their baby who they love and want to be with enough with the blackmailing its wrong and its time it stops ... please sign
